Skills Editing: //remove cooldown - Skill reuse reset. Usage - //remove_cooldown Remove current skills reuse //cancel - Remove Buffs. Usage - //cancel Remove from target all buffs //show_skills - Lists targetted players skills. //remove_skills - Removes the targetted players skills. //skill_list - Opens skill menu. //skill_index - Opens skill menu according to players stats. //add_skill - Adds a skill to a targetted player. Usage - //add_skill Skill_id level //remove_skill - Removes a skill from a targetted player. Usage - //remove_skill Skill_id //get_skills - Temporarily gives you the skills of a targetted player. //reset_skills - Restores your skills from before the get_skills command.
